platforms.question: Which advertising platforms does Sivera support?
platforms.answer: Sivera currently supports Google Ads, Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram), Naver Search Ads, Kakao Moment, and more platforms are being added.

migration.question: Can I migrate my existing ad campaigns?
migration.answer: Yes, Sivera seamlessly connects with your existing ad accounts. Your campaigns remain on their original platforms while being managed through our unified dashboard.

contract.question: Is there a minimum contract period?
contract.answer: No, Sivera offers flexible monthly subscriptions. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel anytime.

security.question: How is data security managed?
security.answer: We use enterprise-grade encryption and security measures. Your ad account credentials are encrypted and we use official APIs for all platform integrations.

integration.question: Are there integration methods other than API?
integration.answer: Yes, we support various integration methods including SDK, webhooks, and database connections depending on your needs.
